response.summary: Industrial engineer with postgraduation studies in statistics and more than three years of experience in finance in different areas such as financial analysis, portfolio administration specially on fixed rent and treasury. Throughthose years I was able to develop many important skills analyzing numbers and information in order to achievethe best decisions. I’m a committed person with a high sense of responsibility, leader spirit and a great team-work.
response.skills: Microsoft Excel, Inglés como lengua extranjera, Análisis de datos, Estadística, Análisis financiero, Trabajo en equipo, Francés, Orientación a objetivos, Oratoria, R

profile_positions.description:
1. To develop and structure the fixed rent operations between the different investors and thecompany.
2. Periodical revision of the main financial KPI’s of the portfolios.
3. Reports about the composition and status of the portfolios.
4. To assure the payment of the yield of the investments.
5. Personalized attention to the different investors.
6. Conciliation of the different accounts

profile_positions.title: Professional Intern

profile_positions.description: I was part of the project which was elaborated by the District Secretary of Education that was held between students of different schools and the National University with the purpose of a reinforcement of the capacities and abilities of teenagers for entering to the university education. I was responsible of the good development of the activities related with teaching, assistance and communication between the parties.
profile_positions.title: Assitant Student
